title: Happy Cog font?
content:
Does anyone recognize this font? thank you in advance for your help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621160900im_/http:/typophile.com/files/happy_5188.png)
author: vukovar

comments.content: There's actually 2 different ones, the slab is, as perfectly spotted by Herb, Rooney. The sans is [Ratio](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621160900/http:/cargocollective.com/pstype/Ratio).
